Sweet Amber

Bring Grimbooze Thunderbrew a bundle of Charred Oak.
Bundle of Charred Oak

Description

Mellifluous liquid clear as a baby's tears
Turns a lovely deep amber over the years
But before we proceed to get lit to the hilt
A barrel of charred oak must be built.

Reward

You will receive:
Thunderbrew's Boot Flask

Progress

Sure, I'll sing it again for you, friend!

Mellifluous liquid clear as a baby's tears
Turns a lovely deep amber over the years
But before we proceed to get lit to the hilt
A barrel of charred oak must be built.

Completion

Aged in the barrel, filtered through coal
It passes your lips and right through your soul.
So lets us drink now, a toast to you
And me while we're at it, Grimbooze Thunderbrew!

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 5600 Experience
